front.title: RECONFIGURE Triggered by DHCPv6 Relay Agents

abstract.t: This document specifies a companion solution to the RSOO (Relay- Supplied Options option) procedure to trigger a DHCPv6 server to issue a RECONFIGURE message. This document defines a new DHCPv6 messages type: RECONFIGURE-REQUEST. This message is issued by a relay agent to notify a DHCPv6 server a change has occurred in the configuration supplied in an RSOO. This document updates RFC 3315.
